---
title: "Data Engineering Pilipinas"
description: |
    "A curated list of IT, computer science, and business courses with certificates & digital badges to earn upon completion. Each course on the list is free to take, along with the badge and certificate."
---

The list is organized as follows:

1. Course/certificate title
2. Course provider/certificate issuer name
3. Level of difficulty (Beginner, Intermediate, or Professional)
4. Course/certificate duration in hours
5. Reward (🏅= Digital Badge or 🏆 = Certificate of Completion)
